tests

Class DistributedStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.DistributedStorage

  • public class DistributedStorage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class presents a user interface that lets the user put/get/list/remove entries in a DHT.
    Author:
    Andreas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private DHT<java.lang.String> dht
      Reference to a Distributed Hash Table.

      Constructor used to create a local network of nodes.

      Constructor used to join an existing DHT.

      • DistributedStorage

        public DistributedStorage(java.lang.String name)

      • DistributedStorage

        public DistributedStorage(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String rName,
                  java.lang.String host,
                  int port)
        Constructor used to join an existing DHT.
        Parameters:
        name - - The local name of this table/node.
        rName - - Remote name of another table (RMI registry name)
        host - - Remote host of the table.
        port - - Port used for RMI connection.

    • Method Detail

      • userInterface

        private void userInterface()
        A simple console-based UI to perform some operations on the DHT.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Create/join a DHT and let the user interact with it.
        Parameters:
        args - - A single argument [name] will create a local dht. Arguments [localname, remotename, remotehost, remoteport] is used to connect to an existing dht.
